Source

 CxList methods = Find_Methods();
CxList getClass = methods.FindByShortName("getClass");
CxList getName = 
	methods.FindByShortName("getName") + 
	methods.FindByShortName("getSimpleName");
getName = getClass.DataInfluencingOn(getName);
CxList compare = methods.FindByShortName("equals");

result = compare.DataInfluencedBy(getName);
